articles.title: Monkeypox: a rare disease with low fatality rates - East Coast Radio
articles.description: Several cases of monkeypox have been detected in North America and Europe since early May, sparking concern that the disease, endemic in parts of Africa, is spreading.
articles.content:
Most people recover within several weeks and monkeypox has only been fatal
in rare cases.
